mapper.select: SELECT s_user_account_invitation.id, s_user_account_invitation.username, s_user_account_invitation.accountId, s_user_account_invitation.invitationStatus, s_user_account_invitation.sentDate, s_user_account_invitation.createdTime, s_account.subdomain FROM s_user_account_invitation LEFT OUTER JOIN s_account ON (s_user_account_invitation.accountId=s_account.id) WHERE s_user_account_invitation.invitationStatus = #{invitationStatus}
